bitswap.title: Booster bitswap limits

simultaneousRequests.label: Simultaneous retrievals
simultaneousRequests.info: Number of simultaneous requests allowed across all clients

simultaneousRequestsPerPeer.info: Number of simultaneous retrievals allowed per Peer ID
simultaneousRequestsPerPeer.label: Simultaneous requests per Peer ID

maxBandwidth.label: Max bandwidth
maxBandwidth.info: Max bandwidth allocated to bitswap (in bits/sec)

bitswap.description:
booster-bitswap can be configured to fetch its config from CIDgravity; these settings will be synced automatically. <1>boost documentation
Use these 2 additional parameters when starting booster-bitswap:

validation.isNotPositiveValue: Value must be a positive integer.
